ygData.subject: Re: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok... make that VIRTUALLY useless... Or, useless to MOST people... After all, NOTHING is completely useless now, is it?  Even my (useless) Sense Magic spell is
ygData.messageBody:
Ok... make that VIRTUALLY useless... Or, useless to MOST people... After
all, NOTHING is completely useless now, is it? Even my (useless) Sense
Magic spell is good for raising my divination skills without using hardly
any mana... Even if it is not good for sensing magic (doesn't work or need
to as ANYONE can sense if the item is magic or not by looking at it!)...

Geez... Symantics...

Lemac Justerian - High Elf Cleric on Karana server
Proud member of Platinum Sphere Guild - www.platinumsphere.com

> From: Paul Heenan <pheenan@...>
>
> So then how can you say that Reinforced is "useless" ? If nobody has it,
> that is.
